title: Provides for a plan of expenditure for monies appropriated and received by the state on behalf of a gaming facility located in the city of Buffalo
summary: Provides for a plan of expenditure for monies appropriated and received by the state on behalf of a gaming facility located in the city of Buffalo; provides for the repeal of such provisions on December 31, 2020.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to the tribal-state compact revenue account; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
